name: PinkUtils
author: Pink
description: CHROMALITE, THE PC BURN MARKS MOD AND THE NOTICEBOARD MUST BE UNINSTALLED FOR THIS TO FUNCTION. Gives the game more of a 'PC feel' with Custom Difficulty Names, Custom Song Saber Colours, in addition to a 'Custom Levels' Tab, etc. Mod contains ChromaLite, the PC BurnMarks Mod, and the NoticeBoard built into it. A config file is found within this mod's download zip. If you need any help editing the config, or have questions, join one of the discords on www.questboard.xyz, and ask in a help channel.
